did.unittitle: Deeds and Land Grants Collected by John Linn Hurt, Jr. 1755-1831

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Deeds and Land Grants Collected by John Linn Hurt, Jr. , Accession #38-155, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a deposit of John L. Hurt, Jr. of Hurt, Virginia in 1939, was made a gift in Ocotber 1959.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This addition to the John L. Hurt Papers consists of 22 items, deeds and land grants in Pittsylvania County, Virginia, dating from 1755-1831.
